channel.title: Angélica Gorodischer on
channel.description: Recent content in Angélica Gorodischer on

item.title: Kalpa Imperial
item.description: Exquisite. I could gush about it, or quote it; instead, I’ll say that Angélica translated by Ursula is about the best match you could ask for. Up there with [[authors/italo calvino|Calvino]] and Orsinian Tales and Always Coming Home. A [[notes/mosaic novel|mosaic novel]], yes?
